title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing a new image into the layout, the original image is still displayed instead of the newly imported one.
EB: Importing a new image should replace the original image and display the newly imported one.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view. 
2. Delete this image file from the outlineimage. 
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'. 
4. Import the renamed 'image1.jpg' file into the layout view again. 
5. Observe that the original image is still displayed instead of the newly imported one.
